name: Barbell Back Squat
notes: King of lower body exercises. Keep chest up, break at hips and knees simultaneously.

name: Barbell Front Squat
notes: Emphasizes quads more than back squat. Requires good wrist and thoracic mobility.

name: Barbell Bench Press
notes: Primary horizontal press. Arch back slightly, retract shoulder blades.

name: Incline Barbell Bench Press
notes: Targets upper chest. Set bench to 30-45 degrees.

name: Barbell Overhead Press
notes: Strict press from shoulders to lockout. Brace core throughout.

name: Barbell Deadlift
notes: Full posterior chain movement. Maintain neutral spine throughout.

name: Sumo Deadlift
notes: Wide stance variation. Better for lifters with longer torsos.

name: Romanian Deadlift
notes: Hip hinge with slight knee bend. Feel the stretch in hamstrings.

name: Barbell Row
notes: Bent over row. Keep torso at roughly 45 degrees, pull to lower chest.

name: Pendlay Row
notes: Strict barbell row from the floor each rep. Torso parallel to ground.

name: Power Clean
notes: Olympic lift variation. Explosive pull from floor to front rack position.

name: Barbell Hip Thrust
notes: Back against bench, drive hips up. Squeeze glutes at top.

name: Barbell Curl
notes: Keep elbows pinned to sides. Control the eccentric.

name: Close Grip Bench Press
notes: Hands shoulder-width apart. Emphasizes triceps over chest.

name: Barbell Skull Crusher
notes: Lower bar to forehead, extend arms. Keep elbows pointing up.

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
notes: Greater range of motion than barbell. Good for addressing imbalances.

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
notes: Seated or standing. Press dumbbells overhead to lockout.

name: Dumbbell Row
notes: One arm at a time. Brace on bench with opposite hand and knee.

name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
notes: Raise to shoulder height. Slight bend in elbows, controlled movement.

name: Dumbbell Bicep Curl
notes: Alternate or simultaneous. Supinate wrist at top of movement.

name: Dumbbell Hammer Curl
notes: Neutral grip throughout. Targets brachioradialis and brachialis.

name: Dumbbell Tricep Overhead Extension
notes: Hold one dumbbell overhead with both hands. Lower behind head.

name: Dumbbell Lunge
notes: Step forward, lower back knee toward ground. Keep torso upright.

name: Dumbbell Romanian Deadlift
notes: Hip hinge with dumbbells at sides. Similar to barbell RDL.

name: Goblet Squat
notes: Hold dumbbell at chest. Great for learning squat mechanics.

name: Dumbbell Fly
notes: Slight bend in elbows, arc dumbbells out and together. Feel the chest stretch.

name: Lat Pulldown
notes: Pull bar to upper chest. Lean back slightly, squeeze shoulder blades.

name: Seated Cable Row
notes: Pull handle to lower chest. Keep torso upright, squeeze at contraction.

name: Cable Fly
notes: Constant tension throughout range of motion. Adjust pulley height for angles.

name: Cable Tricep Pushdown
notes: Keep elbows at sides. Extend forearms fully, squeeze at bottom.

name: Cable Face Pull
notes: Pull rope to face level, externally rotate at end. Great for rear delts and posture.

name: Cable Curl
notes: Constant tension curl. Use straight bar or EZ bar attachment.

name: Leg Press
notes: Adjust foot placement for emphasis. Higher = more glutes, lower = more quads.

name: Leg Extension
notes: Isolates quads. Control the weight, pause at top.

name: Leg Curl
notes: Lying or seated. Full range of motion, control the eccentric.

name: Hack Squat
notes: Machine-guided squat pattern. Good for quad focus without spinal loading.

name: Chest Press Machine
notes: Machine bench press variation. Good for beginners or burnout sets.

name: Shoulder Press Machine
notes: Guided overhead press. Safer for heavy overhead work.

name: Calf Raise Machine
notes: Full range of motion. Pause at bottom stretch and top contraction.

name: Pull-Up
notes: Overhand grip, pull chin above bar. Add weight with belt when bodyweight is easy.

name: Chin-Up
notes: Underhand grip. More bicep involvement than pull-ups.

name: Dip
notes: Lean forward for chest emphasis, stay upright for triceps. Add weight with belt.

name: Push-Up
notes: Body straight from head to heels. Hands slightly wider than shoulders.

name: Plank
notes: Hold position with body straight. Brace core, don't let hips sag.

name: Hanging Leg Raise
notes: Hang from bar, raise legs to parallel or higher. Control the swing.

name: Ab Wheel Rollout
notes: Extend out slowly, maintain hollow body position. Start from knees.

name: Barbell Shrug
notes: Shrug shoulders straight up toward ears. Hold at top briefly.

name: Wrist Curl
notes: Forearms on bench, curl wrists up. Builds grip and forearm size.
